title: Open book decompositions with page a four-punctured sphere
summary: In this paper, we study contact structures supported by open book decompositions whose pages are four-punctured spheres. The paper is split into two parts. In the first part, we find infinitely many overtwisted, right-veering monodromies on the four-punctured sphere. This is done using the techniques developed by Ito-Kawamuro in the papers arXiv:1112.5874, arXiv:1310.6404. Although most of the monodromies that we show are overtwisted are pseudo-Anosov, we are also able to classify precisely which reducible monodromies on the four-punctured sphere are tight. In the second part of the paper, we reprove part of a result of Lekili arXiv:1008.3529 by classifying which reducible mondromies have non-zero Heegaard Floer invariant. This is done by using the bordered contact invariants of Min-Varvarezos arXiv:2410.05511.

AI.tldr: 研究四穿孔球面页的开书分解所支撑的接触结构，分为两部分：第一部分找到无限多个超扭曲的右移单同态，第二部分重新证明Lekili的部分结果，分类哪些可约单同态具有非零Heegaard Floer不变量。
AI.motivation: 研究四穿孔球面页的开书分解所支撑的接触结构，旨在理解这类特殊拓扑结构中的接触几何性质，特别是单同态的超扭曲性和紧致性分类问题。
AI.method: 第一部分使用Ito-Kawamuro在arXiv:1112.5874和arXiv:1310.6404中发展的技术，找到无限多个超扭曲的右移单同态；第二部分使用Min-Varvarezos在arXiv:2410.05511中提出的有界接触不变量，重新证明Lekili的部分结果。
AI.result: 找到了无限多个超扭曲的右移单同态，其中大部分是伪Anosov类型；精确分类了哪些可约单同态是紧致的；分类了哪些可约单同态具有非零Heegaard Floer不变量。
AI.conclusion: 该研究深入分析了四穿孔球面页开书分解的接触结构特性，为理解这类拓扑结构中的接触几何提供了重要结果，特别是在单同态的超扭曲性、紧致性和Heegaard Floer不变量方面的分类工作。

title: On the second homology of the genus 3 hyperelliptic Torelli group
summary: Let $s$ be a fixed hyperelliptic involution of the closed, oriented genus $g$ surface $Σ_g$. The hyperelliptic Torelli group $\mathcal{SI}_g$ is the subgroup of the mapping class group $\mathrm{Mod}(Σ_g)$ consisting of elements that act trivially on $\mathrm{H}_1(Σ_g;\mathbb{Z})$ and commute with $s$. It is generated by Dehn twists about $s$-invariant separating curves, and its cohomological dimension is $g-1$. In this paper we study the top homology group $\mathrm{H}_2(\mathcal{SI}_3;\mathbb{Z})$. For each pair of disjoint $s$-invariant separating curves there is a naturally associated abelian cycle in $\mathrm{H}_2(\mathcal{SI}_3;\mathbb{Z})$; we call such cycles \emph{simple}. We show that simple abelian cycles are in bijection with orthogonal (with respect to the intersection form) splittings of $\mathrm{H}_1(Σ_3;\mathbb{Z})$ satisfying a simple algebraic condition, and prove that these abelian cycles are linearly independent in $\mathrm{H}_2(\mathcal{SI}_3;\mathbb{Z})$.

AI.tldr: 研究超椭圆Torelli群SI_3的二维同调群H_2(SI_3;Z)，证明由不相交的s-不变分离曲线产生的简单阿贝尔循环是线性无关的
AI.motivation: 超椭圆Torelli群SI_g是映射类群中与超椭圆对合s交换且在整系数同调上平凡作用的子群。虽然已知其同调维数为g-1，但对具体同调群的结构了解有限，特别是对于g=3的情况，其二维同调群的结构尚不清楚。
AI.method: 通过研究s-不变分离曲线的Dehn扭转，构造简单阿贝尔循环。建立这些循环与H_1(Σ_3;Z)的正交分裂之间的对应关系，并证明这些阿贝尔循环在H_2(SI_3;Z)中是线性无关的。
AI.result: 证明了简单阿贝尔循环与满足特定代数条件的正交分裂之间存在双射关系，并且这些阿贝尔循环在H_2(SI_3;Z)中是线性无关的。
AI.conclusion: 对于超椭圆Torelli群SI_3，其二维同调群中的简单阿贝尔循环具有清晰的代数刻画，并且这些循环构成线性无关集合，为理解该群的高维同调结构提供了重要进展。

title: A diagrammatic approach to the three-page index
summary:
The three-page index $α_3(L)$ is an invariant that measures the complexity of representing a link $L$ in a three-page book. It is known that $α_3(L)$ admits a linear upper bound in terms of the crossing number, with equality realized by the Hopf link.
  In this paper, we investigate the equality case of this bound from a diagrammatic viewpoint. Starting from a reduced link diagram, we construct three-page presentations via binding circles arising as boundaries of suitable contractible subcomplexes of the induced cell decomposition of the $2$-sphere. This approach allows a refined control of the number of arcs in the resulting three-page presentation.
  As a consequence, we prove that for any non-split, nontrivial link $L$ other than the Hopf link, \[ α_3(L)\le 3c(L)-1, \] and hence characterize completely the links for which $α_3(L)=3c(L)$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了三维页面指数α₃(L)与交叉数c(L)之间线性上界等号成立的情况，证明了除Hopf链环外，所有非分裂非平凡链环都满足α₃(L) ≤ 3c(L)-1，从而完全刻画了α₃(L)=3c(L)的链环。
AI.motivation: 三维页面指数α₃(L)是衡量链环在三维页面书中表示复杂度的不变量。已知α₃(L)关于交叉数c(L)存在线性上界，且Hopf链环达到等号。本文旨在从图式角度研究这个等号成立的情况，完全刻画哪些链环能达到这个上界。
AI.method: 从约化的链环图式出发，通过构造绑定圆（作为二维球面诱导胞腔分解中合适可缩子复形的边界）来构建三维页面表示。这种方法能够精细控制结果三维页面表示中的弧线数量。
AI.result: 证明了对于任何非分裂、非平凡的链环L（除了Hopf链环），都有α₃(L) ≤ 3c(L)-1。从而完全刻画了满足α₃(L)=3c(L)的链环，即只有Hopf链环能达到这个上界。
AI.conclusion: 本文通过图式方法完全解决了三维页面指数与交叉数之间线性上界等号成立的问题，证明了只有Hopf链环能达到α₃(L)=3c(L)的上界，所有其他非分裂非平凡链环都满足更严格的不等式α₃(L) ≤ 3c(L)-1。

title: Fiber-preserving and orientation-reversing involutions of Seifert fibered 3-manifolds
summary: We consider fiber-preserving, orientation-reversing involutions on orientable Seifert fibered 3-manifolds and the conditions on a manifold for admissibility of such involutions. We construct a class $Ψ$ of fiber-preserving, orientation-reversing involutions that act trivially on the base. Each element of $Ψ$ is obtained by extending a product involution across Seifert pieces of type $V(2,2;-1)$ - a solid torus with three fibers filled according to Seifert invariants $(2,1)$, $(2,1)$, and $(1,-1)$. We show that $Ψ$ forms a single conjugacy class under fiber-preserving diffeomorphisms. Our main result establishes that any fiber-preserving, orientation-reversing involution factors as $ψ\circ g$, where $g$ is fiber-preserving and orientation-preserving and $ψ\inΨ$, thus reducing the problem to the previously known orientation-preserving case. Through the orientable base-space double covering, we further extend the classification to manifolds with non-orientable base orbifold.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了可定向Seifert纤维化3-流形上的纤维保持、方向反转对合，构造了Ψ类对合，并证明了任意此类对合可分解为ψ∘g形式，从而将问题约化为已知的保向情形。
AI.motivation: 研究可定向Seifert纤维化3-流形上纤维保持、方向反转对合的存在条件，旨在建立此类对合的分类理论，为理解3-流形的对称性提供基础。
AI.method: 构造Ψ类纤维保持、方向反转对合，通过将积对合扩展到V(2,2;-1)型Seifert块上实现。证明任意此类对合可分解为ψ∘g，其中ψ∈Ψ，g为纤维保持保向映射，从而利用已知的保向情形分类。
AI.result: Ψ类在纤维保持微分同胚下构成单一共轭类；任意纤维保持、方向反转对合可分解为ψ∘g形式；通过可定向底空间二重覆盖，将分类推广到具有不可定向底轨道面的流形。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了可定向Seifert纤维化3-流形上纤维保持、方向反转对合的完整分类框架，通过分解定理将问题约化为已知的保向情形，并通过二重覆盖推广到更一般情形。

title: A volume formula for Reuleaux polyhedra
summary: A ball polyhedron is a finite intersection of congruent balls in $\mathbb{R}^3$. These shapes arise in various contexts in discrete and convex geometry. We focus on Reuleaux polyhedra, the subclass of ball polyhedra whose centers and vertices coincide. Building on Bogosel's recent work on the volume of Meissner polyhedra, we derive a formula for the volume of Reuleaux polyhedra in terms of their edges.

AI.tldr: 本文推导了Reuleaux多面体体积的计算公式，该公式基于多面体的边来表示体积。
AI.motivation: 球多面体是三维空间中有限个全等球的交集，在离散几何和凸几何中有广泛应用。Reuleaux多面体是球多面体的一个子类，其中心与顶点重合。研究这类多面体的体积计算具有理论意义。
AI.method: 基于Bogosel最近关于Meissner多面体体积的研究工作，通过数学推导建立了Reuleaux多面体体积与其边的关系公式。
AI.result: 成功推导出Reuleaux多面体体积的计算公式，该公式用多面体的边来表示体积。
AI.conclusion: 本文为Reuleaux多面体的体积计算提供了新的数学公式，扩展了球多面体理论的研究工具。

title: Patterns and Tracks
summary: Patterns in triangulated $2$-spheres and $3$-spheres are investigated. A new proof of a lemma in Abigail Thompson's proof of the Recognition Algorithm for $3$-spheres is obtained.

AI.tldr: 本文研究三角化2-球面和3-球面的模式，并为Abigail Thompson的3-球面识别算法证明中的一个引理提供了新证明。
AI.motivation: 研究三角化球面的组合模式，特别是为3-球面识别算法中的关键引理提供更简洁或更优雅的证明。
AI.method: 通过分析三角化2-球面和3-球面的组合模式，运用组合拓扑学方法重新证明Thompson引理。
AI.result: 获得了Thompson引理的新证明，该引理是3-球面识别算法证明中的关键组成部分。
AI.conclusion: 三角化球面的模式分析不仅具有理论意义，还能为现有算法提供更简洁的证明方法。

title: On the discrete logarithmic Minkowski problem in the plane
summary: The paper characterizes the convex hull of the closure of the cone-volume set $C_\cv(U)$, consisting of all cone-volume vectors of polygons with outer unit normals vectors contained in $U$, for any finite set $U \subseteq \R^2, \pos(U) = \R^2$. We prove that this convex hull has finitely many extreme points by providing both a vertex representation as well as a half space representation. As a consequence, we derive new necessary conditions, which depend on $U$, for the existence of solutions to the logarithmic Minkowski problem in $\R^2$.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了二维空间中多边形锥体积向量集合的凸包结构，证明了该凸包具有有限多个极值点，并给出了顶点表示和半空间表示，从而推导出对数Minkowski问题解存在的新必要条件。
AI.motivation: 研究多边形锥体积向量集合的凸包结构，特别是对于具有给定外法向量集合的多边形。这一研究有助于理解对数Minkowski问题解的存在条件，该问题是凸几何中的重要问题。
AI.method: 通过分析锥体积集合C_cv(U)的凸包结构，其中U是R^2中的有限集合且满足pos(U)=R^2。论文提供了该凸包的顶点表示和半空间表示，证明了其具有有限多个极值点。
AI.result: 证明了锥体积向量集合凸包具有有限多个极值点，给出了完整的顶点表示和半空间表示。作为应用，推导出了依赖于U的对数Minkowski问题解存在的新必要条件。
AI.conclusion: 该研究完全刻画了多边形锥体积向量集合凸包的结构特征，为对数Minkowski问题提供了新的理论工具和必要条件，深化了对凸几何中这一重要问题的理解。

title: Periodic families in the homology of $GL_n(F_2)$
summary: We construct infinite families of nonzero classes in $H_d(GL_n(F_2);F_2)$ along lines of the form $d =\frac{2}{3}n +$(constant), thereby showing that the known slope $\frac{2}{3}$-stability for these homology groups are optimal. Using the new stability Hopf algebra perspective of Randal-Williams, our computations in addition recover the slope-$\frac{2}{3}$ stability for $GL_n(Z)$ with coefficients in $F_2$, improve that for $Aut(F_n)$ to $\frac{2}{3}$, and demonstrate that those slopes are optimal. Perhaps of independent interest, we also provide a manual for computing stability Hopf algebras over $F_2$.

AI.tldr: 本文构造了无限族非零同调类，证明GL_n(F_2)同调群的2/3斜率稳定性是最优的，并推广到GL_n(Z)和Aut(F_n)的稳定性结果。
AI.motivation: 研究一般线性群GL_n(F_2)的同调稳定性问题，特别是验证已知的2/3斜率稳定性是否最优，并将结果推广到其他代数结构。
AI.method: 使用Randal-Williams的稳定性Hopf代数新视角，在F_2系数下构造无限族非零同调类，并提供了计算稳定性Hopf代数的实用手册。
AI.result: 证明了GL_n(F_2)同调群的2/3斜率稳定性是最优的，恢复了GL_n(Z)的2/3斜率稳定性，将Aut(F_n)的稳定性改进到2/3，并证明这些斜率都是最优的。
AI.conclusion: 稳定性Hopf代数方法为研究同调稳定性提供了强大工具，2/3斜率在多个代数结构中都表现为最优稳定性边界，相关计算手册对后续研究有独立价值。

title: Classification of invariant tight contact structures on the 3-space, -ball and -sphere
summary: We prove some classification results for tight contact structure in the 3-space, -ball and -sphere that are invariant with respect to some arbitrary involution, that is conjugated to the standard rotation around the x-axis. Unlike the classical scenario, a new integral torsion appears, dictating a splitting between equivalence classes. These tools could be useful fur future classification results regarding strongly invertible Legendrian knots.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了关于3维空间、球体和球面上紧接触结构的分类结果，这些结构在某种对合变换下不变，该对合变换与绕x轴的标准旋转共轭。与经典情况不同，出现了新的积分扭转，导致等价类分裂。
AI.motivation: 研究在特定对合变换下不变的紧接触结构分类，为未来关于强可逆勒让德结的分类结果提供工具。
AI.method: 证明分类结果，分析在绕x轴标准旋转共轭的对合变换下不变的紧接触结构，引入新的积分扭转概念。
AI.result: 获得了3维空间、球体和球面上紧接触结构的分类结果，发现了新的积分扭转导致等价类分裂，不同于经典情况。
AI.conclusion: 这些工具对研究强可逆勒让德结的分类有潜在应用价值，积分扭转的出现为接触几何中的分类问题提供了新的视角。

title: Packing minima of convex bodies
summary: In 2021, Henk, Schymura and Xue introduced packing minima, associated with a convex body and a lattice, as packing counterparts to the covering minima of Kannan and Lovász. Motivated by conjectures on the volume inequalities for the successive minima, we generalized the definition of the packing minima to the class of all convex bodies that contain the origin in their interior. For these packing minima, we presented several novel volume inequalities and calculated the specific values of the packing minima for several special convex bodies.

AI.tldr: 将packing minima推广到包含原点在内的所有凸体，建立新的体积不等式并计算特殊凸体的packing minima值
AI.motivation: 受关于逐次极小值的体积不等式猜想启发，将Henk等人提出的packing minima从凸体推广到包含原点在内的所有凸体
AI.method: 推广packing minima的定义到包含原点在内的所有凸体，建立新的体积不等式，并计算特殊凸体的具体packing minima值
AI.result: 提出了推广的packing minima定义，建立了多个新的体积不等式，并计算了特殊凸体的packing minima具体数值
AI.conclusion: 成功将packing minima推广到更广泛的凸体类，建立了相关体积不等式，为后续研究提供了理论基础和具体计算实例

title: On spaces of embeddings of circles in surfaces
summary: We consider the space of embeddings of finitely many circles that bound disks in non-positively curved surfaces. We index the connected components of this space with finite rooted trees and show that the connected components are classifying spaces of the ``braided" automorphism groups of the associated trees. An intermediate step to proving these results is to construct a strong deformation retract onto the subspace of geometric circles; moreover, this strong deformation retraction is equivariant with respect to transformations of the surface.

AI.tldr: 研究非正曲率曲面上有限多个圆盘的嵌入空间，通过有限有根树索引其连通分支，证明这些连通分支是相应树的"辫式"自同构群的分类空间。
AI.motivation: 研究非正曲率曲面上圆盘边界嵌入空间的拓扑结构，理解其连通分支的分类和代数拓扑性质。
AI.method: 使用有限有根树索引嵌入空间的连通分支，构造到几何圆子空间的强形变收缩，并证明该收缩在曲面变换下是等变的。
AI.result: 证明了连通分支与树的"辫式"自同构群的分类空间同伦等价，建立了嵌入空间拓扑结构与树代数结构之间的联系。
AI.conclusion: 非正曲率曲面上圆盘边界嵌入空间的拓扑结构可以通过有限有根树完全描述，其连通分支的代数拓扑性质由相应树的辫式自同构群决定。

title: Conformal dimension and its attainment on self-similar Laakso-type fractal spaces
summary: A general construction of Laakso-type fractal spaces was recently introduced by the first two authors. In this paper, we establish a simple condition characterizing when the Ahlfors regular conformal dimension of a symmetric Laakso-type fractal space is attained. The attaining metrics are constructed explicitly. This gives new examples of attainment and clarifies the possible obstructions.

AI.tldr: 本文为Laakso型分形空间建立了Ahlfors正则共形维数可达性的简单判别条件，并显式构造了可达度量，给出了新的可达例子并澄清了可能的障碍。
AI.motivation: 最近两位作者引入了一般Laakso型分形空间的构造，但对其Ahlfors正则共形维数的可达性条件尚不明确。本文旨在建立简单的判别条件来刻画何时这种维数可达。
AI.method: 通过分析对称Laakso型分形空间的几何结构，建立可达性的特征条件，并显式构造出能够达到Ahlfors正则共形维数的具体度量。
AI.result: 获得了对称Laakso型分形空间Ahlfors正则共形维数可达的简单判别条件，构造了可达度量，给出了新的可达例子，并澄清了可能的障碍。
AI.conclusion: 本文为Laakso型分形空间建立了可达性的完整理论框架，不仅提供了可达性的判别准则，还给出了显式构造方法，深化了对分形空间几何结构的理解。

title: Non-finitely generated $(\mathbb{Z}_2)^k$-equivariant bordism ring
summary: In 1998, Mukherjee and Sankaran posed two problems concerning the algebraic structure of the equivariant bordism ring of smooth closed $(\mathbb{Z}_2)^k$-manifolds with only isolated fixed points. One is the property of being finitely generated as a $\mathbb{Z}_2$-algebra, and the other is the existence of indecomposable elements. This paper definitively resolves both problems for the fully effective case. Specifically, let $\mathcal{Z}_*((\mathbb{Z}_2)^k)$ denote the equivariant bordism ring of smooth closed manifolds equipped with fully effective smooth $(\mathbb{Z}_2)^k$-actions having only isolated fixed points. We prove that $\mathcal{Z}_*((\mathbb{Z}_2)^k)$ is not finitely generated as a $\mathbb{Z}_2$-algebra for all $k\geqslant 3$. Moreover, the proof explicitly constructs an infinite family of indecomposable elements with unbounded degrees, thereby settling the second problem simultaneously.

AI.tldr: 证明了对于k≥3，具有孤立不动点的完全有效(Z₂)ᵏ作用的等变配边环不是有限生成的Z₂代数，并构造了无限族不可分解元素。
AI.motivation: 解决Mukherjee和Sankaran在1998年提出的两个问题：关于具有孤立不动点的(Z₂)ᵏ-流形等变配边环的代数结构，特别是有限生成性和不可分解元素的存在性。
AI.method: 研究具有孤立不动点的完全有效(Z₂)ᵏ作用的等变配边环𝒵*((Z₂)ᵏ)。通过构造性证明，展示该环对于k≥3不是有限生成的Z₂代数。
AI.result: 证明了𝒵*((Z₂)ᵏ)对于所有k≥3不是有限生成的Z₂代数。同时构造了一个具有无界次数的无限族不可分解元素，从而解决了第二个问题。
AI.conclusion: 完全解决了Mukherjee和Sankaran提出的两个问题：对于k≥3，具有孤立不动点的完全有效(Z₂)ᵏ作用的等变配边环不是有限生成的，并且存在无限多个不可分解元素。
